content:
raravena80 opened Issue #2628:

Hello wasmtime team,

I'm one of the co-chairs of the CNCF SIG-Runtime, I think it would be great for you to present/discuss wasmtime at one of our meetings. For example, discuss things such as general architecture, use cases, current state of the project, etc. I think the community would greatly benefit from it.

Let me know if this something you'd be interested in doing. If yes, please feel free to add it to our agenda or reach out to me (raravena80 at gmail.com)

Thanks!
